website_summaries.verdict: Lots of fun colors in faux leather add a pop of interest to the room.
pros: Handles on the side open the ottoman so you can flip the top over and use it as a table
Trays nest into the ottoman to stay stable, and are easy to wipe down
This is a good alternative to similar ones sold in big name stores that cost twice as much
cons: Many reports of damage in the shipping process

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! So happy with this purchase. Came in a beautiful blue and lots of room. Great for using it as a laptop desk or to hold a glass of wine. Totally worth it! I have a small studio apartment and this was just the perfect size for my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! It arrived in Perfect condition, size, color our place it’s small needed for placing a couple of Throw blankets and having a tray for drinks without needing a coffee table it’s great very happy and actually arrive 2 days early 👍🏼 Thinking of ordering another one for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great storage space or table top for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my living room. We're able to store our daughters toys and kick our feet up on it comfortably. Two star removal because there is an issue we have . There is slight damage under the unit but it was packaged and arrived perfectly and completely unnoticeable but is still damage.
customer_reviews.author: Elson

customer_reviews.title: I love this ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is exactly what I needed! I was looking for something to store all our throw comforters, and came across this ottoman. And, I love the it! I live in a small townhouse with a dog, a toddler and an infant, so space is important. Since we don’t have a coffee a table anymore, this is perfect for my morning coffee with the kids. I would recommend this ottoman to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Convenience Concepts Designs4Comfort Accent Storage Ottoman, in Burgundy Faux Leather. Ordered it on Feb. 7, 2020 and it arrived on Wed. Feb. 12th, even though it was through PRIME. It arrived safely and the overall look of the ottoman was very nice. Looks well made with plenty of room for blankets or whatever you decide to put in it. Even though I just got it, I would recommend it on looks & quality of material alone, but the price and the good selection of colors makes it a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: PatD

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, and especially the pink color. Is VERY durable fabric/faux leather. I bought two to keep at the foot of my bed--for storage (plenty of space inside) and for seating. The seat is comfortable, and I love the little tray on the flip side of the top cushion. It's fantastic for a guest bedroom! It holds my weight without any problem, and I'm about 145 lbs. Also, the seat is low enough for me to be able to put on my socks and tie my shoes--very important, since I've had hip-replacement surgery and can't bend down as easily now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving it 5 stars because it is good quality, exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 5 stars because it is good quality, exactly as described, shipping was super fast, and the price is great. I personally do not like the color I got and have no idea what I was thinking when I ordered it, however, it is exactly as pictured so that is entirely my fault. Was going to put it in the living room, but now it will go in a guest bedroom, which works well for putting a lamp and book on top and sheets in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: hesmine

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size to fit iner the desk counter in my kitchen. Adds extra storage space, and provides a nice seat. This is very sturdy - I even feel safe standing on it to reach high shelves. My only issue is that it arrived with a slit in the upholstery. The contact info provided by Amazon is wrong. I did track down the manufacturer to inquire on a replacement or discount; they responded to request photos, I sent them the same day, and I haven't heard anything since. It's been over 2 weeks and I've followed up several times. I will not be buying from this seller again...
customer_reviews.author: GwenB

customer_reviews.title: so this is a wonderful solution. A chair
customer_reviews.text: My apartment is tiny, so this is a wonderful solution. A chair, a table, or a footstool all in one. Not to mention precious storage space! Easy to move around if you don't load it with books. It also looks very nice - the gray is sort of a beige gray - and you can tuck the handle loops if you don't want to see it. Big enough for feet and a cat, or two pairs of feet and a cramped cat.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Taped together fabric
customer_reviews.text: Its a cute piece but the quality is a problem. The handle that you use to lift the top off has a split in it that's taped together. It looks like it was an end roll of the fabric and they eeked out the last little bit. I called the company and they sent a new top...IT HAS THE SAME DEFECT! Looks like taping the material together is part of their manufacturing practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Seems reasonably strong and looks pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have seen other brands that have a less durable construction. This one does not feel flimsy and seems reasonably able to support weight. I like the overall design with the exception of the handles - I would prefer cutouts or notches in the side rather than handles that hang out. I ordered the espresso color and the color seems accurate. The finish is more glossy than I prefer but doesn't look bad.
customer_reviews.author: SDPMP

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for the Price But Falls Apart Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and practicality of this product. Unfortunately, the pleather and seaming tears very easily. We are a household of two adults and have been careful using the ottoman. We’ve only had it for about 3 weeks and I’ve already noticed multiple rips.
customer_reviews.author: BookworkHLH

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: We needed more space so we got rid of our huge coffee table and got this. I love it because I can just push it into the dinning area so that my kids have more space to play in the living room. The storage is also great. I can just throw all of their Little People that they play with in there and pull them out and put them away quickly. I also like that you can flip the top and make it into a table if people want to set drinks on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Deveau

customer_reviews.title: lots of space
customer_reviews.text: lots of space I have 2 body pillows rolled up and a inter comfeter great color true to the picture has a odd smell for a few months but nothing a couple dryer sheets don't fix. sturdy my 2 year old abuses it and is holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the ottoman and it's seems to be made of sound construction. I love the tray for a cover, very nice. Color is beautiful. From buying it based on the picture alone it was more and better than I expected. I plan on resting my feet on it for years to come! And could not beat the price. I saw others out there for several times the price that look roughly the same in construction.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Wolman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for saving space- ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the tiny apartment I first lived in! And the storage space was so nice to store blankets in. Also the feature where the lid turns into a tray is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Blake and Emma Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Best storage ottoman at this price, by far!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. It became part of the family overnight. It is simple and sturdy and surprisingly large. It holds a snuggly blanket and pillow very easily. In the pictures I used a banana remote for scale. The flip over tray is awesome and you can tuck the little handles inside with small effort. just right for us
customer_reviews.author: Sadyana

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color of this one. Easy to clean the faux leather. I usually use it for a foot rest, but got it cus I needed a different storage place for my grandson's toys at my house. He loves taking the lid off and turning it over to the tray side as well as getting out his toys. Just the right size too for him to sit on and watch some TV.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Fixit

customer_reviews.title: It looks expensive and is well made
customer_reviews.text: I use the ottoman for storage and placed in front of my fireplace. My apartment is small and this is a perfect size. It also gave my apartment a pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: bird

customer_reviews.title: Multi function
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one then loved it so much ordered another. Beautiful aqua to look at,well made. Good storage. Use as a tray or for your feet. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: dolphin40

customer_reviews.title: Price High But I Recommend This Product!
customer_reviews.text: This Is A Good👍 Product But It's Priced HIGH For A Faux Leather Product! It's Comfortable To Rest Your Legs & Feet On. Plus, It's Comfortable & Sturdy Enough To Sit On w/Out Buckling Like The Cheaper Folding Ottoman! And It Has A Table On The Other Side To Place Your Beverage,... Snacks,... Or Play BoardGames & Cards!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid M. Newman

customer_reviews.title: They are very handy and look/ work fine. Both times I had to send the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these-one for my living room and one for family room. They are very handy and look/ work fine. Both times I had to send the first one back because it was either damaged in transit OR not sewn properly. Not the best made or top quality materials-but it is a very handy ottoman for storage, feet and serving. Despite the issues with it-I am enjoying the products!
customer_reviews.author: MARIE R.

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd ottoman I’ve ordered from these folks. They are great! Never had a problem with any of them. Nice colors that always look as pictured. Comfy to both sit on and put your feet up on. Nice amount of storage for books, papers, etc., plus the top can serve as a tray if you wish. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: FLKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Great Ottoman and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. When I started my search, I told myself no brown and no leather-look. Naturally, I ordered brown and leather style and I was so happy when it arrived. The size is perfect. Does not take up a lot of space and the extra storage is so handy. This is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stein

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I selected this one out of all the choices on Amazon. It is just the right size and match for my club chairs, is sturdy and very good-looking, allows plenty of room for pillow/blanket storage, and the tray sits across the top or firmly inside the opening so nothing will spill! Have gotten many compliments on the grouping.
customer_reviews.author: J Holt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new small ottoman!! I have a a second bedroom that I turned into a den and so I needed a smaller ottoman! And this one is perfect plus I can still store throws and stuff in it and it had other uses like a table if you turn it over and it is strong enough for an extra seat. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Yo Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Dangerous defect.
customer_reviews.text: My wife sliced open her foot when foot brushed along the edge of the ottoman and the point of a carpentry staple just below the fabric poked through and injured her. Really poor workmanship makes this a hazard. Once we cleaned her wound and cleaned up the copious amounts of blood on the floor this item when out never to return. Adding insult to the injury, she had to get a tetanus shot
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for our space
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our living room which is also the play room. My son had one of those lego type huge storage bag that was falling apart. Since we're all staying home because covid I want to pretty up our space. Plus when ppl can come over again, eventually, we will have more seats.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for our furniture and room. Very nice. I removed the fixed pads on the bottom that came on the unit and added casters so we can easily move it around in our room. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Storage
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how sturdy this is. I keep purses in it. I can stand on it and not feel any give. The construction and materials are quality.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieCat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Has wooden support on all 4 sides. Perfect to use to step into raised bed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for at an affordable price! I needed a small/medium sized ottoman that I can use to get on/off my raised bed. This does exactly that with storage space and can be used as a makeshift table. The structure itself is quite sturdy. On all 4 sides there is wood supporting the ottoman so it is not flimsy. Granted I’m a smaller person, ~125 lbs, but I can comfortably climb on and off this thing. I strongly believe it could support someone heavier too. Overall, very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jiahao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for I wanted something that could hold my throw blankets. I also was looking for a decorative ottoman that I could occasionally use as a chair for when I briefly sew. And this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: a.m.alva

customer_reviews.title: Cute but One Flaw
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but it has visible black string looking things under the thin material. It doesn’t look good if you look closely. I am hoping to cover it with some lumbar pillows. Good for small spaces maybe choose a darker color. Mine was yellow and the black stringy material showed underneath.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ottoman to replace a footstool for a recliner because it is taller than my footstool and therefore more comfortable when reclining to watch a movie for its duration. I also liked its storage capacity for blankets and pillows as I live in a small apartment and am limited on space. I have used it for hours and days on end in the month or two that I have had it and it still looks great. It is holding up under constant use.
customer_reviews.author: TXChikk

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product for any room and unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my daughter's room so she could store her dolls and tea sets in there. She has a tea party on the overturned lid, and it cleans up really well! She loves to sit on it when she's not playing with it. I'm going to order 2 more for my 2 toddler boys' rooms to act as their toyboxes . It's so comfortable to sit on, and it will be another "chair" in their rooms!
customer_reviews.author: ShannMarie

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing.
customer_reviews.text: The lid sits down sturdily even when you flip it over and use it as a trap. The capacity inside is nice too. So far it seems to be taking quite a beating and it holds up well anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a stool under my daughters loft bed. I like the fact that it can be used to sit on as well as storage. And the tray is a nice extra. It feels more expensive than it was. I think it will last a long time. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment spaces!
customer_reviews.text: When looking online, I needed something that looked great in my space and also was a storage solution... this ottoman is PERFECT! Holds up to my 1 year old and busy household perfectly! Would recommend to anyone who has a small space, and doesn’t want to spend a fortune on an ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than a regular storage cube
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and it did not disappoint. Bigger than a cube to fit large throw blankets, sturdy and love the top with the tray, perfect fit next to the couch for storage and an extra side table.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma G.

customer_reviews.title: Feet UP
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. No problems with the quality. Move it around the living room and has held up well. Easy to clean. Stores 4 or more throw blankets depends on size. Cover does fit snug so can be a chore to take off.
customer_reviews.author: ET H-Town

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: Will look nice in my small condo. Storage, foot rest and snack tray for games.
customer_reviews.author: kenn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman! Perfect for my small bedroom. Sturdy enough to sit on or to rest your feet. The white is more of an off white color. Lots of storage space inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Best value for price : Ottomon with flip tray
customer_reviews.text: Best price and good quality for ottomon with flip tray and handles. Comes in many colors, spacious storage space and comfortable seating. Lightweight but sturdy snd easy to move around as well. Looks great. Only issue was that the white handles had black scratch marks most likely from the interior black border of the box
customer_reviews.author: Pranali

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue one and the company sent me a tan one. I tried to make it work, but it just wasnt going with my color scheme. The company sent me a return slip amd covered the costs of shipping the tan one back. I receieved the navy blue one within 2 days. Great customer service. The ottoman is very good quality, especially for the price. I love that i can sit on it, use it as a footrest, store things, and use it as a tray. Love the versatile uses.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Jane DIY

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for our RV!
customer_reviews.text: This was just the right ottoman for our RV living room. Stores a bunch of stuff in a little space. Love the tray on the top for our guests drinks. Have gotten many compliments! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Flip top with tray.
customer_reviews.text: The storage is great and the flip top makes a wonderful snacking area for those times in front of the TV. Sturdy and heavy enough not to tip over. Very pleased. Maybe ordering another one for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: rallo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly light. The tray part can be used as a lap tray— great for snacking or working on the computer. Pretty comfortable as a seat, too.
customer_reviews.author: eva mesa

customer_reviews.title: Super nice!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations! It is alot bugher than I thought and it was a very nice surprise! Definitely recommend this. Great amount of storage and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: We really like this storage ottoman! We are using it in our RV, looks great. I store throw blankets in it and love the flip cover to use as a little coffee table. It is sturdy but kind of heavy for me to move around, otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: sunnyday

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good looking and very functional. My only wish is that the legs were not so flush with the floor. It would have been nice to have an inch more clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Julia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy!! The Ottoman was very well crafted. It is comfortable and very sturdy. Added bonus is the top tray to serve refreshments and there's plenty of storage. I highly recommend this product. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Cooper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this. Another one of my favorite amazon purchases ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Another one of my favorite amazon purchases this year. I store five throw blankets in this, it's very roomy and well made. My husband loves the flip top option. He uses it to put his coffee on it in the morning, or his snacks when we are watching TV together. Great quality - will be a part of our living room area for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Millet

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 of them
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good colors, looks nice. Very handy the way the top closes snugly but also flips over to be used as a tray. ive bought 2, i recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jmb02129

customer_reviews.title: The first one arrived damaged pretty badly. Customer service was great and issued a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product for the price. It is not white – it is Ivory. The first one arrived damaged pretty badly. Customer service was great and issued a return label and sent out a replacement right away. The second one arrived in better condition and was given as a gift. The recipient was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JeM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, rich blue color!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Rich royal blue color, versatile usage, with storage room, and top flipped over to reveal functional tray. Side loop handles are helpful to pull top off. Design and stitching very clean, stylish. Works perfectly in our office for a visitor seat or to store clutter. Bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Grandma has had a hinged lid storage ottoman for her knitting, since maybe the 50s. We use it as a spare seat when we visit. This one seems like it is almost as nice. The flip lid is a nice touch. I like the dark blue (it's not exactly navy) and hope to get as much use out of this as she has hers. I read measurements carefully but didn't get a chance to compare to hers. This is a bit bigger, which means it's more awkward to carry but will hold more.
customer_reviews.author: CAB, mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: Great ottoman, beautiful color. Nice concept for small spaces, adds storage and the lid flips to make a tray. I’m guessing I could also use the lid on lap for a TV tray. Very cool piece.
customer_reviews.author: Krissi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for me
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting something so well made and solid (though I'm obviously thankful it is because it wasn't cheap to buy :) ). Perfect size for me. I wanted something I could put my laptop on when I wasn't working on it or just searching things off and on. And also something I could use as a footstool so it needed to be soft. The flip side tray to put drinks on is an extra bonus!
customer_reviews.author: OCDiva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our TV room! I needed a foot rest, and a coffee table, and this fits both needs! I debated between the white and the navy, I'm glad I chose the white as the couch is navy and the rug is navy/white. It is not ivory, it is a nice, bright white. It's a little smaller than I pictured, but it is still absolutely perfect. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquielovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Cute little ottoman. I thought it would be a little higher, but it’s still nice. Great for storage plus I love the tray.
customer_reviews.author: chris shockley

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little cute furniture! I love mine. It’s functional as ottoman, coffee table, and storage. The top lid comes off easily and it’s well made. The fabric feels like “leather”, and any mishap wipes off easily without staining. It’s light so it moves around very easily. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the “faux leather” is somewhat cheap looking, which I knew it would be. But for this price- a storage cube that works as ottoman or a serving table with the top reversed to tray? Don’t think you can beat it. The size is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Style Tip Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Looks nice perfect size for what I need it for. The first one I ordered cane damaged but could have came from being shipped. I returned and they sent me another one and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: so I am a little disappointed. However
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 white ones and they are really an off-white, so I am a little disappointed. However, I use them side-by-side as a coffee table / foot-rest for my new sectional sofa. They look good and the trays function well when we are eating at the sofa!
customer_reviews.author: countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the bunk room
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our RV. Perfect size for the bunk room! Extra storage in a small space that has small storage & a tray for the kiddos to use while they watch a movie! Color is true to picture & it is well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great investment
customer_reviews.text: It was great quality for the price. I like the added extra of the flip serving tray I got it to pack up items that were cluttering my living room. It was the perfect size and has more storage then expected Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage
customer_reviews.text: It's a great box to store my living room throw blankets and pillows when not in use. It's a small box but it's perfect. The top flios open to use as a table or lap tray. I just wish there were handles on the outside so it can be moved easily but it is very lightweight- yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marina U.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little piece! Definitely works for my small apartment, but may not be suitable for larger needs. Looks great to me, and I'm able to store 4-5 throw blankets.
customer_reviews.author: LuluBee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ottoman for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size for our small sitting room! I Love that the top that turns into a tray to set coffee or snacks on. No assembly required just removed the plastic and it was ready for use! Arrived earlier than anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping2do

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman for smaller spaces & great value too.
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman was a bit smaller but than I thought it would be but still works perfectly in our space. The removable/reversible tray is handy. The material looks just like leather too. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with the style and size of this piece. It's perfect for our needs. We did have a small issue, there was a spot of some kind on the top. I contacted the seller and they immediately sent us a new top. We were very impressed with their customer service. Will definitely consider this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzer2808

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Foot Stool
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I would like but very comfortable to put my feet up on. I like that the lid can be turned over to made a tray. Looks great. I am happy with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marykate Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ottomans
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Quality material and product. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alfee

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in grey and really like it. It's clearly vinyl, but there is no smell, and looks pretty good for the price. The storage area is large and it will also make good extra seating in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistency
customer_reviews.text: I V have bought this product before in a different color and loved it. However this purchase is falling apart not even a month after using. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: nice little ottomans
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a large coffee table in a small living room (bought 2). They are perfect. The blue is bright but actually kind of livens things up in the living room. I dislike how the handles flap out but i like how the handles are there so that I can turn the top over with ease. They are light and move around well, plus i sit on them without problem, and can store extra blankets and pillows in them. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: zensm

customer_reviews.title: haddock. Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, lightweight and easy to move. Seat firm and comfortable, sturdy. Think it will last longer than my former hassock.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! The color was pretty much exactly like pictured. I use it for shoe storage and it fits four pairs of ankle boots and about seven pairs of heels. I would order again if I ever need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this, great size with lots of room. Great quality and the tray lid is a really convenient feature
customer_reviews.author: Alysioni

customer_reviews.title: A place for everything.  Good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these ottomans instead of having a coffee table. My kids love them, since everyone gets their own ottoman / table. The quality is very good for the price! Also, I appreciated that they came assembled and ready to use right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Mom

customer_reviews.title: A Match
customer_reviews.text: Purchase a leather brown easy chair, this ottoman match exactly, the price was amazing. Love it
customer_reviews.author: kW

customer_reviews.title: Score!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Small, but sturdy, stylish and, for me, holds two blankets and heating pad. For the record, I never give 5-star reviews!
customer_reviews.author: MsFierce

customer_reviews.title: Great bargin. Attractive & sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent storage capacity. Attractive & just the right size for a small space. Sturdy & comfy as foot stool.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J ELLINGTON

customer_reviews.title: It’s bright and yellow and I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, love the bright yellow color and the tray. Using it in my craft space to hide supplies, the tray gives me added space to place things while I craft. Great for small spaces and apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Rod

customer_reviews.title: Box and item arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived repackaged in a bigger box. The original box was shredded and held together with duct and shipping tape. The tear in the box showed the ottoman inside and it was also torn. As for returning, I do not have a printer and live nowhere near convenient shipping options given. Quite a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Foot Stool
customer_reviews.text: We use the foot stool with our couch. We are able to store things inside the foot stool. The height was perfect to our couch.
customer_reviews.author: Miyagi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and really nice looking, love these
customer_reviews.text: These are even better than I expected. The reviews made me worry these were flimsy and the pictures made them seem to have a patent leather sheen. But they are not only very sturdy, they look expensive with no cheap sheen. The trays are great and well designed. I would buy these again in a heartbeat. Plus they come with no assembly required
customer_reviews.author: S. O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Ordered on a whim with a gift card I won thinking it was a 50-50 chance it would be cheap quality but figured it was basically free so I would give it a shot. Boy was I VERY pleasantly surprised when I opened the box. Great but!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this as our office coffee table. Didn't even know it came with the tray !
customer_reviews.author: EN13

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged returned immediately, looked like it would have been nice if the leather wasn't peeeled up on the side
customer_reviews.author: Tuesdai Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's attractive and durable. Love it for storage, sitting and the tray is useful for eating.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great! Little small.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright color! Smelled like plastic when first arrived but overall it is a nice little ottoman. Small but would work in smaller apartments or dorms.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: ... to add to my boys room that would be sturdy enough for me to stand on so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking everywhere for something to add to my boys room that would be sturdy enough for me to stand on so I can make the top bunk of their bunk beds. For the price I decided on this one, and I must say I'm very pleased with my product. It is very sturdy and works out well as a table or a seat depending on what they need. It also is sturdy enough for me to stand on which is great. The color is true to picture. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love this ottoman !!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, very cute. Multi functional. Great price, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: debbie watson

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman/toybox/traytable/bench
customer_reviews.text: Using 2 pink ones as toy boxes and they are perfect. My girls flip the tops over and use the trays all the time for coloring and playing with toys. Even sturdy enough for my 3 and 6 year old to each sit on while looking at books. I like that they are probably going to be able to use these for years and not just while they are small.
customer_reviews.author: CLew

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman was exactly what I was looking for and I was delighted with the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works perfect for my space!! My daughter spilled her drink on the wood and it bubbles so definitely use coasters!! But it arrived quick and just as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: The tray is extremely scratched up
customer_reviews.text: The tray is so scratched up on one side, it looks like someone tried to send it after they painted it. I’ve already sent this back once for the same reason. I’m just going to keep it and paint it my friggin self! I attached a picture of each side of the tray
customer_reviews.author: Lori J.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue, and the color is not the same as in the photos. It is lighter and more dull than the photos, and it does not work well with the color scheme in my living room because it is the wrong tone. The quality also feels cheap, though I suppose that's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, this is pretty much what I expected. It is very basic and gets the job done as a storage ottoman. It is extremely white. Meaning, if your furniture is even a little bit off white, this will be brighter than your furniture. Also, it smells like plastic and is very obviously not leather. This was not a problem for me, but I did feel compelled to toss a throw over the ottoman and keep it there.
customer_reviews.author: Jonel

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Designs4Comfort Accent Storage Ottoman, Yellow
product_meta.description: Color:YellowAvailable in different colors the accent storage ottoman is sure to brighten up any room while providing additional storage. The removable lid provides easy access, and serves as a tray. Whether you're using it for storage, a table top, or a lap tray you'll be sure to enjoy it for years to come.
feature_bullets: Double sided lid features multifunctional tray

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars653 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
